members.document:
Sub-policy ID
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: RuleId

members.document:
Severity. Valid values: `HIGH` (high); `MIDDLE` (medium); `LOW` (low).
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: RuleLevel

AbnormalProcessEventDescription.document: Description of the abnormal container process event at runtime

members.document:
Event remarks
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: Remark

members.document: Name of the hit rule. Valid values: `PROXY_TOOL` (proxy); `TRANSFER_CONTROL` (lateral movement); `ATTACK_CMD` (malicious command); `REVERSE_SHELL` (reverse shell); `FILELESS` (fileless execution); `RISK_CMD` (high-risk command); `ABNORMAL_CHILD_PROC` (unusual start found in the child process of the sensitive service); `USER_DEFINED_RULE` (custom rule).
members.name: RuleName

members.document:
Last processing time of the event
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: OperationTime

members.document:
Name of the hit policy. Valid values: `SYSTEM_DEFINED_RULE` (preset policy); name of the custom policy.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: GroupName

AbnormalProcessEventInfo.document: Container runtime security - Information of the abnormal process

members.document: Name of the hit rule. Valid values: `PROXY_TOOL` (proxy); `TRANSFER_CONTROL` (lateral movement); `ATTACK_CMD` (malicious command); `REVERSE_SHELL` (reverse shell); `FILELESS` (fileless execution); `RISK_CMD` (high-risk command); `ABNORMAL_CHILD_PROC` (unusual start found in the child process of the sensitive service); `USER_DEFINED_RULE` (custom rule).
members.name: MatchRuleName

members.document:
Action execution result. `BEHAVIOR_NONE`: None.
    `BEHAVIOR_ALERT`: Alert.
    `BEHAVIOR_RELEASE`: Allow.
    `BEHAVIOR_HOLDUP_FAILED`: Failed to block.
    `BEHAVIOR_HOLDUP_SUCCESSED`: Blocked.
members.name: Behavior

Filter
  • Status- String - Required: No - Plugin status. Valid values: `EVENT_UNDEAL` (pending); `EVENT_DEALED` (processed); `EVENT_IGNORE` (ignored); `EVENT_DEFENDED` (defended).
  • ContainerStatus- String - Required: No - Container status. Valid values: `CREATED` (created); `RUNNING` (running); `PAUSED` (suspended); `STOPPED` (stopped); `RESTARTING` (restarting); `REMOVING` (removing); `DESTROYED` (terminated).
  • ContainerNetStatus- String - Required: No - Container network status. Valid values: `NORMAL` (not isolated); `ISOLATED` (isolated); `ISOLATE_FAILED` (isolation failed); `RESTORE_FAILED` (recovery failed); `RESTORING` (recovering); `ISOLATING` (isolating).
  • EventType - String - Required: No - Intrusion status. Valid values: `EVENT_DEFENDED` (defended successfully); `EVENT_ATTACK` (attack attempt).
  • TimeRange- String - Required: No - Time range. The first value indicates the start time, and the second the end time.
  • VulName- string - Required: No - Vulnerability name
  • CVEID- string - Required: No - CVE No.
  • SourceIP- string - Required: No - Attacker IP
  • ContainerName- string - Required: No - Container name

  • ImageName- string - Required: No - Image name

members.document:
Filter
  • FileName - String - Required: No - Filename
  • FilePath - String - Required: No - File path
  • VirusName - String - Required: No - Virus name
  • ContainerName- String - Required: Yes - Container name
  • ContainerId- string - Required: No - Container ID
  • ImageName- string - Required: No - Image name
  • ImageId- string - Required: No - Image ID
  • IsRealTime- int - Required: No - Whether it is real-time monitoring data
  • TaskId- string - Required: No - Task ID
  • TimeRange - string - Required: No - Time range ["2022-03-31 16:55:00", "2022-03-31 17:00:00"]
  • ContainerNetStatus - String - Required: No - Container network status. Valid values: `NORMAL`, `ISOLATED`, `ISOLATING`, `RESTORING`, `RESTORE_FAILED`.
  • ContainerStatus - string - Required: No - Container status. Valid values: `RUNNING`, `PAUSED`, `STOPPED`, `CREATED`, `DESTROYED`, `RESTARTING`, `REMOVING`.
  • AutoIsolateMode - string - Required: No - Isolation method. Valid values: `MANUAL`, `AUTO`.
  • MD5 - string - Required: No - MD5

Image type. Valid values: `LOCAL` (local image); `REGISTRY` (repository image).
members.name: ImageType

members.document: Whether to license all local images, which has a higher priority than licensing by local image ID. When it is `true`, `UpdatedLocalImageCnt` should be greater than `0`.
members.name: AllLocalImages

members.document: Whether to license all repository images, with a higher priority than licensing by image ID. When it is `true`, `UpdatedRegistryImageCnt` should be greater than `0`.
members.name: AllRegistryImages

members.document: Specified number of local images to be licensed, with the highest priority. Any difference between this number and the actual number will be randomly ignored.
members.name: UpdatedLocalImageCnt

members.document: Specified number of repository images to be licensed, with the highest priority. Any difference between this number and the actual number will be randomly ignored.
members.name: UpdatedRegistryImageCnt

members.document: Licensing by eligible local images. Valid values of local image source: `ASSETIMAGE` (local image list); `IMAGEALL` (local image sync). This parameter is required when `AllLocalImages` is `false`, `LocalImageIds` is empty, and `UpdatedLocalImageCnt` is greater than `0`.
members.name: ImageSourceType

members.document: Licensing by eligible local images. This parameter is required when `AllLocalImages` is `false`, `LocalImageIds` is empty, and `UpdatedLocalImageCnt` is greater than `0`.
members.name: LocalImageFilter

members.document: Licensing by eligible repository images. This parameter is required when `AllRegistryImages` is `false`, `RegistryImageIds` is empty, and `UpdatedRegistryImageCnt` is greater than `0`.
members.name: RegistryImageFilter

members.document: Licensing by eligible images, excluding specified local image IDs
members.name: ExcludeLocalImageIds

members.document: Licensing by eligible images, excluding specified repository image IDs
members.name: ExcludeRegistryImageIds

members.document: Licensing by local image ID. This parameter has a higher priority than licensing by eligible images. It is required when `AllLocalImages` is `false`, `LocalImageFilter` is empty, and `UpdatedLocalImageCnt` is greater than `0`.
members.name: LocalImageIds

members.document: Licensing by repository image ID. This parameter has a higher priority than licensing by eligible images. It is required when `AllRegistryImages` is `false`, `RegistryImageFilter` is empty, and `UpdatedRegistryImageCnt` is greater than `0`.
members.name: RegistryImageIds

members.document: Whether to only include latest images. This parameter is required for repository images when `RegistryImageFilter` is not empty and `UpdatedRegistryImageCnt` is greater than `0`.
members.name: OnlyShowLatest

members.document:
Alert level policy control. Each binary bit represents a meaning, and the value is passed as a string.
The control switch can be high, medium, or low, corresponding to the third, second, and first binary bit, respectively. Valid values: `0` (off); `1` (on).
For example, if the high and medium levels indicate to enable the alert and the low level indicates to disable it, the binary value is `110`.
If level control does not take effect for the alert type, pass in `1`.
members.name: ControlBits
